attributes.action: Take control for e-petitions away from the No 10 team and give to independent - and faster moving - body
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This facility to petition the PM is an excellent one, even if the government take little notice of it. But it might have more credibility if control of it was taken away from the No 10 team as they decide what petitions are allowed are what are not. Hardly free speech. Also they are very slow to decide on whether a petition is acceptable. I'm waiting three days so far for my last one.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
